mapper.select: SELECT BBS_SEQ , BBS_SBJ , REG_EMP_NO , case when REG_EMP_NM is null then '' else REG_EMP_NM end as REG_EMP_NM , (SELECT p.RET_VALUE FROM GET_FORMAT_DATE(REG_DATE) p ) as REG_DATE , (SELECT p.RET_VALUE FROM GET_FORMAT_HMS(REG_HMS) p ) as REG_HMS , BBS_NOTE FROM TBBS_MGT WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}
SELECT BBS_SEQ , FILE_SEQ , FILE_NAME FROM TBBS_FILE WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBBS_FILE (BBS_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, FILE_NAME) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(BBS_SEQ) FROM TBBS_MGT), (SELECT MAX(BBS_SEQ) FROM TBBS_MGT), #{fileName} )
mapper.select: SELECT BBS_SEQ , COMMENT_SEQ , (SELECT p.RET_VALUE FROM GET_FORMAT_DATE(REG_DATE) p ) as REG_DATE , (SELECT p.RET_VALUE FROM GET_FORMAT_HMS(REG_HMS) p ) as REG_HMS , REG_EMP_NO , REG_EMP_NM , COMMENT_NOTE FROM TBBS_COMMENT WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq} ORDER BY COMMENT_SEQ desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBBS_COMMENT (BBS_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, REG_DATE, REG_HMS, REG_EMP_NO, REG_EMP_NM, COMMENT_NOTE) VALUES ( #{bbsSeq}, (SELECT case when MAX(COMMENT_SEQ) is null then 0 else MAX(COMMENT_SEQ)+1 end as COMMENT_SEQ FROM TBBS_COMMENT WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}), #{regDate},#{regHms},#{regEmpNo},#{regEmpNm},#{commentNote} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBBS_MGT SET BBS_SBJ = #{bbsSbj}, REG_EMP_NO = #{regEmpNo}, REG_EMP_NM = #{regEmpNm}, REG_DATE = #{regDate}, REG_HMS = #{regHms}, BBS_NOTE = #{bbsNote} WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{bbsSeq}
